en: Illinois Coordinate System of 1983 Galesburg zone (US survey foot): Transverse Mercator (Illinois_Coordinate_System_of_1983_Galesburg_zone__US_survey_foot_)
Part of the ICS83 33-zone system. Longitude of origin also given by information source as 269°54'E. State law defines grid unit as US survey foot. No equivalent metric definition.
